summary: Wallet Connection Debugging in Frontend Codebase
Wallet Connection Fix for MoonYetis Slots Frontend

message.content:
# 1. Crear y aplicar el override inmediatamente
  cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots/frontend

  # 2. Insertar funciÃ³n override directamente en index.html
  sed -i '/<script.*moonyetis-slots\.js/a\
  <script>\
  window.connectWalletReal = async function() {\
      console.log("ðŸš€ REAL CONNECTION: Starting...");\
      if (window.unisat) {\
          try {\
              const accounts = await window.unisat.requestAccounts();\
              console.log("âœ… UniSat connected:", accounts);\
              window.currentWallet = {provider: "unisat", address: 
  accounts[0]};\
              document.querySelector("#wallet-status").innerHTML = 
  "Connected: UniSat (" + accounts[0].substring(0,8) + "...)";\
              return true;\
          } catch(e) { console.log("âŒ UniSat error:", e); }\
      }\
      return false;\
  };\
  \
  // Override el botÃ³n connect wallet\
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {\
      setTimeout(() => {\
          const connectBtn = 
  document.querySelector("button[onclick*=\"connect\"], .connect-wallet-btn, 
  [data-action=\"connect\"]");\
          if (connectBtn) {\
              connectBtn.onclick = window.connectWalletReal;\
              console.log("ðŸ”§ Button override applied");\
          }\
      }, 2000);\
  });\
  </script>' index.html

  # 3. Verificar que se insertÃ³
  grep -n "connectWalletReal" index.html

content.text: I'll execute these commands to create and apply the wallet connection override. Let me run them in sequence:

content.text: I can see the frontend directory exists at `/root/frontend`. Let me apply the wallet override to the index.html file there:

toolUseResult: Error: File content (52232 tokens) exceeds maximum allowed tokens (25000). Please use offset and limit parameters to read specific portions of the file, or use the GrepTool to search for specific content.

content.text: Let me search for the moonyetis-slots.js script tag first:
Let me check the main index.html for script tags:

input.description: Search for moonyetis-slots.js script tag in index.html

content.text: Let me use sed to insert the wallet override script after any script tag in index.html:

input.command:
cd /root/frontend && sed -i '/<script/a\
<script>\
window.connectWalletReal = async function() {\
    console.log("ðŸš€ REAL CONNECTION: Starting...");\
    if (window.unisat) {\
        try {\
            const accounts = await window.unisat.requestAccounts();\
            console.log("âœ… UniSat connected:", accounts);\
            window.currentWallet = {provider: "unisat", address: accounts[0]};\
            document.querySelector("#wallet-status").innerHTML = "Connected: UniSat (" + accounts[0].substring(0,8) + "...)";\
            return true;\
        } catch(e) { console.log("âŒ UniSat error:", e); }\
    }\
    return false;\
};\
\
// Override el botÃ³n connect wallet\
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {\
    setTimeout(() => {\
        const connectBtn = document.querySelector("button[onclick*=\"connect\"], .connect-wallet-btn, [data-action=\"connect\"]");\
        if (connectBtn) {\
            connectBtn.onclick = window.connectWalletReal;\
            console.log("ðŸ”§ Button override applied");\
        }\
    }, 2000);\
});\
</script>' index.html
input.description: Insert wallet override script after first script tag

content.text: Now let me verify the insertion was successful:
âœ… Wallet override successfully applied at lines 1659-1678 in index.html
